dict.acceptation: 建筑物；建造；解释；建造物；

sent.orig: Scope: Earthwork Construction Machinery Construction Earthwork Construction Machinery Construction.
sent.trans: 经营范围：土石方工程机械施工。

sent.orig: Be competent for consultative work on building construction, construction technique, construction company management construction supervision, etc.
sent.trans: 能胜任建筑施工、施工技术、施工企业管理，建筑监理方面咨询工作。

sent.orig: The construction of understanding in philosophy includes construction method, construction ways and construction symbol.
sent.trans: 哲学理解的建构，包括建构方法、建构途径和建构标识。

sent.orig: The construction units shall conduct the construction according to the approved design documents and construction rules.
sent.trans: 施工单位应当按照已批准的设计文件和施工规程进行施工。

sent.orig: Construction preparation: pre-construction material prepared for the deployment of technical personnel, on-site Construction, procedures for admission.
sent.trans: 施工准备：施工前的物质准备，技术人员的调配，现场交底，办理入场手续。
